Name: Fisherman's House
About the game: You have been mysteriously captured by the terrifying fisherman. The fisherman is famous for kidnapping his victims to eat them afterwards. Your mission? To escape as quickly as possible before the fisherman slaughter you. The Fisherman's House awaits you in this game. In this house there are all sorts of tools and keys that can help you escape from the house. But you should be careful, because the fisherman listens very clearly. Features Randomly generated puzzles — Each game includes new randomly generated locations where items like keys or tools can be hidden. Different levels of difficulty — There are different levels of difficulty that change the speed of movement of the fisherman. He can hear you — Not only the sounds you make inside the game, but also your microphone is part of the game. However, the microphone can be turned off if you like. VR-Mode — Play Fisherman's House like never before! Use your favorite VR headset for a whole new experience. Have fun and enjoy exploring!
